content:
TITLE: Implementing Telegram Bot API Request Classes in C#
DESCRIPTION: Template for implementing Telegram Bot API requests. All request classes must inherit from RequestBase<TResult> and use IEnumerable<T> for collection parameters. Response arrays should be typed as TResult[].
SOURCE: https://github.com/telegrambots/telegram.bot/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: csharp
CODE:
```
RequestBase<TResult>
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: New Telegram Bot API Method Signatures
DESCRIPTION: New method signatures added to ITelegramBotClient interface for managing chat invite links, members and messages.
SOURCE: https://github.com/telegrambots/telegram.bot/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-21_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: C#
CODE:
```
ITelegramBotClient.CreateChatInviteLinkAsync
ITelegramBotClient.EditChatInviteLinkAsync
ITelegramBotClient.RevokeChatInviteLinkAsync
ITelegramBotClient.LogOutAsync
ITelegramBotClient.CloseAsync
ITelegramBotClient.CopyMessageAsync
ITelegramBotClient.UnpinAllChatMessages
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Updated TelegramBotClient Constructor
DESCRIPTION: Modified constructor signature to accept custom Bot API server URL as optional parameter.
SOURCE: https://github.com/telegrambots/telegram.bot/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-21_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: C#
CODE:
```
// Constructor now accepts base url for custom Bot API server as optional third parameter
// Only accepts URLs with protocol, host and port parts
TelegramBotClient(string token, HttpClient httpClient = null, string baseUrl = null)
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Changelog Entry Class Definitions
DESCRIPTION: Structured changelog entries showing API changes, new features and modified components in version 20.0.0 of the Telegram Bot API.
SOURCE: https://github.com/telegrambots/telegram.bot/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
## [v20.0.0] - 2024-06-15

> [Bot API 7.0](https://core.telegram.org/bots/api#december-29-2023) (December 29, 2023)  
> [Bot API 7.1](https://core.telegram.org/bots/api#february-16-2024) (February 16, 2024)  
> [Bot API 7.2](https://core.telegram.org/bots/api#march-31-2024) (March 31, 2024)  
> [Bot API 7.3](https://core.telegram.org/bots/api#may-6-2024) (May 6, 2024)  
> [Bot Api 7.4](https://core.telegram.org/bots/api#may-28-2024) (May 28, 2024)  
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring API Token in JSON
DESCRIPTION: JSON snippet showing how to set the API token in the configuration file. This token is required for executing any test case.
SOURCE: https://github.com/telegrambots/telegram.bot/blob/master/test/Telegram.Bot.Tests.Integ/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "ApiToken": "MyTestBot-API-TOKEN"
  /* ... */
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Setting Bot Commands for Testing
DESCRIPTION: Commands to be set for the test bot using BotFather to facilitate the testing process. These commands allow testers to start test execution and select themselves for admin method testing.
SOURCE: https://github.com/telegrambots/telegram.bot/blob/master/test/Telegram.Bot.Tests.Integ/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: text
CODE:
```
test - Start test execution
  me - Select me for testing admin methods
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Event Handler Type Changes
DESCRIPTION: Renamed and modified event handler types for API requests and responses.
SOURCE: https://github.com/telegrambots/telegram.bot/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-21_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: C#
CODE:
```
// Old
MakingApiRequest
ApiResponseReceived

// New 
OnMakingApiRequest : AsyncEventHandler<ApiRequestEventArgs>
OnApiResponseReceived : AsyncEventHandler<ApiResponseEventArgs>
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Type Changes Example - C#
DESCRIPTION: Example showing type changes in method parameters and properties
SOURCE: https://github.com/telegrambots/telegram.bot/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-21_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: C#
CODE:
```
// Changed type examples
allowedUpdates: IEnumerable<UpdateType>
offset: int
replyMarkup: InlineKeyboardMarkup
prices: IEnumerable<LabeledPrice>
chatId: long
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Method Return Type Changes - C#
DESCRIPTION: Methods that had their return type changed from Task<bool> to Task
SOURCE: https://github.com/telegrambots/telegram.bot/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-21_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: C#
CODE:
```
// Return type changed from Task<bool> to Task
public Task DeleteWebhookAsync()
public Task KickChatMemberAsync()
public Task LeaveChatAsync()
public Task UnbanChatMemberAsync()
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Property Type Changes - C#
DESCRIPTION: Changes in property types for various classes
SOURCE: https://github.com/telegrambots/telegram.bot/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-21_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: C#
CODE:
```
// Property type changes
StickerSet.Stickers: Sticker[]
Message.Entities: MessageEntity[]
Message.CaptionEntities: MessageEntity[]
Message.EntityValues: IEnumerable<string>
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Payment Provider Token in JSON
DESCRIPTION: JSON snippet demonstrating how to set the payment provider token, which is required for payment-related test cases.
SOURCE: https://github.com/telegrambots/telegram.bot/blob/master/test/Telegram.Bot.Tests.Integ/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  /* ... */
  "PaymentProviderToken": "MY-PAYMENT-PROVIDER-TOKEN"
  /* ... */
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Allowed Users in JSON
DESCRIPTION: JSON snippet demonstrating how to specify allowed usernames for testers. Updates from users not in this list are discarded during test execution.
SOURCE: https://github.com/telegrambots/telegram.bot/blob/master/test/Telegram.Bot.Tests.Integ/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  /* ... */
  "AllowedUserNames": "tester1, Tester2, TESTER3"
  /* ... */
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Supergroup Chat ID in JSON
DESCRIPTION: JSON snippet showing how to set the supergroup chat ID in the configuration. This is where most test messages will be sent.
SOURCE: https://github.com/telegrambots/telegram.bot/blob/master/test/Telegram.Bot.Tests.Integ/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  /* ... */
  "SuperGroupChatId": -1234567890
  /* ... */
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Tester's Private Chat ID in JSON
DESCRIPTION: JSON snippet showing how to set a tester's private chat ID, which is necessary for tests involving private chats, such as sending invoices.
SOURCE: https://github.com/telegrambots/telegram.bot/blob/master/test/Telegram.Bot.Tests.Integ/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  /* ... */
  "TesterPrivateChatId": 1234567890
  /* ... */
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Chat Administration Settings in JSON
DESCRIPTION: JSON snippet demonstrating how to configure settings for a regular (non-admin) member used in chat administration tests. These settings include user ID, username, and private chat ID.
SOURCE: https://github.com/telegrambots/telegram.bot/blob/master/test/Telegram.Bot.Tests.Integ/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  /* ... */
  "RegularMemberUserId": 1234567890,
  "RegularMemberUserName": "tester3",
  "RegularMemberPrivateChatId": 1234567890
  /* ... */
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Changelog Template Structure
DESCRIPTION: Template showing the standard format for documenting changes in the project based on Keep a Changelog format and Semantic Versioning.
SOURCE: https://github.com/telegrambots/telegram.bot/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
<!--
All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/)
and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/).


## [Unreleased]

### Added

### Changed

### Fixed

### Removed

-->
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Copying Configuration File for Development
DESCRIPTION: Bash command to create a development-specific configuration file by copying the default appsettings.json. This allows for separate configurations in development environments.
SOURCE: https://github.com/telegrambots/telegram.bot/blob/master/test/Telegram.Bot.Tests.Integ/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
cp appsettings.json appsettings.Development.json
```
